name: Find the Gnome
description:
This is a casual top-down 3D 'hidden object'-like game where you need to find and catch all the garden gnomes.

Find gnomes by carefully monitoring their behavior and catching the weird ones in Story mode.
Or find gnomes in the hide-n-seek mode where you have to catch these quick and versatile creatures. (But you need to find them first...)

What to expect:
  • 13 levels with increasing difficulty
  • 4 story mode levels with a background story, objectives and funny introductions of the different gnomes
  • 3 totally different types of gnomes
  • 2 gamemodes: story and hide-n-seek
  • 2 completely different scenes where the levels take place
  • Track progress and unlock levels
  • Compete against the clock or other players with the time trial mode
  • Slick mouse and keyboard controls
